TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 174
TEI.2.document_title: Edward Dorr et al to Stephen F Austin, 02-28-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: Edward Dorr et al. to Austin, February 28, 1829. Certifying that George Orr has exercised his authority as alcalde unfairly. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 174

div1.p: Edward Dorr et al. to Austin, February 28, 1829. Certifying that George Orr has exercised his authority as alcalde unfairly. (Omitted.)
